title: Azure DevOps Project Template
description: Schema for validating YAML project templates that define Azure DevOps work item hierarchies (Epics → Features → Stories → Tasks).

epics.description: Top-level work items representing major project initiatives.

epic.description: An Epic work item — the highest level of the hierarchy.

title.description: Epic title. Used as the parent reference for child features.

description.description: Business-oriented description of the epic's scope and value.

id.description: Azure DevOps work item ID (populated when reading from API).

state.description: Work item state (e.g. 'New', 'Active', 'Closed'). Populated when reading from API.

acceptance_criteria.description: Acceptance criteria (populated when reading from API).

story_points.description: Story point estimate (populated when reading from API).

estimate.description: Effort estimate in hours (populated when reading from API).

feature.description: A Feature work item — a capability or component within an epic.

title.description: Feature title. May contain {{name}} placeholders for parameterized features.

description.description: Description of the feature's scope and purpose.

id.description: Azure DevOps work item ID (populated when reading from API).

state.description: Work item state (e.g. 'New', 'Active', 'Closed'). Populated when reading from API.

acceptance_criteria.description: Acceptance criteria (populated when reading from API).

story_points.description: Story point estimate (populated when reading from API).

estimate.description: Effort estimate in hours (populated when reading from API).

optional.description: When true, the feature can be excluded via the 'exclude' parameter.

parameterized.description: When true, the feature is duplicated per instance with {{name}} replaced.

default_instances.description: Default instance names for parameterized features. Only valid when parameterized is true.

stories.description: User stories belonging to this feature.

title.description: Story title. May contain {{ name }} placeholders for parameterized stories.

description.description: Story description, ideally in 'As a [role], I want [capability], so that [benefit]' format.

acceptance_criteria.description: Bullet-pointed acceptance criteria for the story. Converted to HTML on upload.

id.description: Azure DevOps work item ID (populated when reading from API).

state.description: Work item state (e.g. 'New', 'Active', 'Closed'). Populated when reading from API.

estimate.description: Effort estimate in hours (populated when reading from API).

story_points.description: Estimated complexity using the Fibonacci scale.

parameterized.description: When true, story is duplicated per instance within its feature.

instance_key.description: Label for the instance group (e.g. 'Dimension', 'Fact'). Required when parameterized is true.

default_instances.description: Default instance names for parameterized stories.

task.description: A Task work item — the lowest level of the hierarchy.

title.description: Task title describing the specific action.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the task.

id.description: Azure DevOps work item ID (populated when reading from API).

state.description: Work item state (e.g. 'New', 'Active', 'Closed'). Populated when reading from API.

acceptance_criteria.description: Acceptance criteria (populated when reading from API).

story_points.description: Story point estimate (populated when reading from API).
